action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X X X X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X X ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a triangular pattern in the upper left, and empty squares form a triangular pattern in the lower right.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a diagonal line from top-right to bottom-right, with all spaces to the right of this line filled with X's and all spaces to the left filled with empty squares.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a triangular pattern in the upper left, and empty squares form a triangular pattern in the lower right.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In your grid, is there an X in position (2,2) counting from top-left?
